00019 #ifndef _GEN_FILENAME_HPP_cm101217_
00020 #define _GEN_FILENAME_HPP_cm101217_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <stdexcept>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 
00029 class gen_filename : private boost::noncopyable {
00030 public:
00031   typedef enum file_period {
00032     PeriodDay,
00033     PeriodHour,
00034     Period5Minutes,
00035     Period1Minute
00036   } file_period;
00037   
00038   virtual ~gen_filename() {}
00039 
00040   virtual file_period filePeriod() const { return PeriodDay; }
00041   virtual std::string filePrefix() const { return ""; }
00042   virtual std::string fileExtension() const { return "txt"; }
00043   virtual boost::filesystem::path gen_file_path(std::string basePath,
00044                                                 std::string tag,
00045                                                 boost::posix_time::ptime t) const {
00046     boost::filesystem::path p(basePath+"/"+tag);
00047     boost::filesystem::create_directories(p);
00048     std::stringstream oss;
00049     // the created time_facet is owned by \c oss and therefore does not need to be destroyed
00050     oss.imbue(std::locale(oss.getloc(), 
00051                           new boost::posix_time::time_facet(make_time_format(filePeriod()).c_str())));
00052     // compute time modulo 5 minutes
00053     if (filePeriod() == Period5Minutes) {
00054       const boost::posix_time::time_duration td(t.time_of_day());         
00055       t= boost::posix_time::ptime(t.date(), 
00056                                   boost::posix_time::time_duration(td.hours(), 5*(td.minutes()/5), 0));
00057     }
00058     oss << "/" << filePrefix() << t << "." << fileExtension();
00059     return p/=(oss.str());
00060   }
00061   
00062   static file_period str2period(std::string s) {
00063     if (s == "1d") return PeriodDay;
00064     if (s == "1h") return PeriodHour;
00065     if (s == "5m") return Period5Minutes;
00066     if (s == "1m") return Period1Minute;
00067     throw std::runtime_error("str2period: invalid period '" + s + "'");
00068   }
00069 
00070 protected:
00071 private:
00072   static std::string make_time_format(file_period p) {
00073     std::string time_facet_format;
00074     switch (p) {
00075     case PeriodDay:
00076       time_facet_format="y%Y-m%m-d%d"; 
00077       break;
00078     case PeriodHour:
00079       time_facet_format="y%Y-m%m-d%d_H%H";
00080         break;
00081     case Period5Minutes:
00082     case Period1Minute:
00083       time_facet_format="y%Y-m%m-d%d_H%HM%M";
00084       break;
00085     default:
00086       throw std::runtime_error("requested file_period is not supported");
00087     }
00088     return time_facet_format;
00089   }
00090 } ;
00091 
00092 #endif // _GEN_FILENAME_HPP_cm101217_
